DOC.brief_summary: Open-label , non-randomised , single dose study 6 healthy male subject assess mass balance recovery , metabolite profile , metabolite identification pharmacokinetics 14C-labelled APD421
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age 18 65 year age time sign informed consent Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 , outside range , consider clinically significant investigator Must willing able communicate participate whole study Must provide write informed consent Must agree use adequate method contraception ( defined Section 8.4 ) Must regular bowel movement ( ie average stool production ≥1 ≤3 stool per day ) Prior participation another study radiation burden > 0.1 mSv ≤ 1 mSv period 1 year prior screening ; radiation burden > 1 mSv ≤ 2 mSv period 2 year prior screen ; radiation burden > 2 mSv ≤ 3 mSv period 3 year prior screen , etc ( add 1 year per 1 mSv )
